Package com.example.eventsnapqr

Class Event

java.lang.Object
com.example.eventsnapqr.Event
public class Event extends Object
represents an event with a name, organizer, description, poster, maxAttendees (optional), and a announcements string. maxAttendee (optional)

  • Constructor Summary

    constructor for event requiring a user instance, QR code, event name, a description, a URL to the event poster and a max number of attendees.

  • Constructor Details

    • Event

      public Event(User organizer, String eventName, String description, String posterURI, Integer maxAttendees, String eventID, Date eventStartDateTime, Date eventEndDateTime, String address, String QR)
      constructor for event requiring a user instance, QR code, event name, a description, a URL to the event poster and a max number of attendees. used when all fields are provided
      Parameters:
      organizer - user who organized the event
      eventName - name of the event
      description - description of the event
      posterURI - URL for the event poster
      maxAttendees - maximum number of attendees
